name: Gemabek
description:
GEMABEK - THE TIMELESS ADVENTURE Welcome to a world where humanity stands on the brink of destruction. As a player, you take on the role of a hero who travels through time to prevent a catastrophe that has already happened. Gemabek is a unique gaming experience that combines shooter combat and stealth gameplay and presents you with the ultimate challenge.

FEATURES: TIME TRAVEL: Use your time-travel device to switch between the post-apocalyptic present and the past, which was oppressed by a regime.

COMPLEX LEVELS: Sneak through a guarded military research facility in the past or fight against dangerous enemies in the post-apocalyptic present. Each time period has its own challenges and dangers.

TACTICAL DECISIONS: Choose a playstyle that suits you. Use your stealth gameplay skills to take out watchful enemies unnoticed, or resort to shooter combat to fight your way through difficult situations.

PROGRESSION: Collect new weapons and improve your skills to become stronger and master more challenging levels.

UNIQUE GAMING EXPERIENCE: Gemabek is a unique gaming experience where you travel through time to save the world and overthrow the regime. With your time-travel device, you have the power to change the future and determine the fate of humanity.

Gemabek is the perfect game for those looking for a challenging and exciting gaming experience. Experience a gripping story, travel through time, and fight dangerous enemies to save the world. Are you ready for the adventure of a lifetime? Then grab Gemabek and dive into a world full of dangers and possibilities.

This is only a vertical slice of our game.
